discussion.p: Daniel writes in a private email:

blockquote.p: - 3.3 'Additions to header <limits>' contains two errors in the specialisation of numeric_limits<decimal::decimal128>:

ol.li: The static member max() returns DEC128_MIN, this should be DEC128_MAX.
The static member digits is assigned to 384, this should be 34 (Probably mixed up with the max. exponent for decimal::decimal64).

resolution.p: In "3.3 Additions to header <limits>" change numeric_limits<decimal::decimal128> as follows:
